front.title: IS-IS TE Procedures for Learning Local Addresses

abstract.t: This document describes procedures that enable a router to populateits Traffic Engineering Database (TED), with local addresses of otherrouters, that are not advertised in IS-IS TE extensions. The onlyaddresses belonging to a router that are advertised in IS-IS TE LSAsare the router's local addresses on links enabled for TE and theRouter ID. The described procedures enable a router to computetraffic engineered MPLS LSPs to a given router's loopback and non-TEcapable interface addresses.
